City Council
============

mayor and city council
![Dais Group (Use for Website)](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/revize_photo_gallery/Photos/Dais%20Group%20(Use%20for%20Website).jpg?t=202508261250270)

DESOTO CITY COUNCIL OVERVIEW
----------------------------

The City Council is the governing and law making body of the City of DeSoto and consists of a Mayor and six Councilmembers. All are elected at large, by qualified voters of the entire city, and members must reside in the district they represent. The Mayor represents the city as a whole and is not required to live in a particular district.

DESOTO CITY COUNCIL
-------------------

* [Place One: Mayor Rachel L. Proctor](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_one_mayor/index.php)
* [Place Two: Pierette Parker](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_two.php)
* [Place Three: Ken Waters](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_three.php)
* [Place Five: Debrah North](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_five.php)
* [Place Six: Mayor Pro Tem Crystal Chism](https://desototexas.gov/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_six.php)
* [Place Seven: Letitia Hughes](https://www.ci.desoto.tx.us/government/city_council/find_your_councilmember/place_seven.php)

Meetings are open to the public and are held on the first and third Tuesday of every month at 6 p.m. in the Council Chambers in City Hall at Town Center (211 East Pleasant Run Road, at the corner of Pleasant Run and Hampton Road). The City Council Work Session begins at 6 p.m. in the City Council Conference Room located behind the Council Chambers.
DeSoto City Council meetings are broadcast live in their entirety on our
website
and via the DeSoto TV streaming app on
Roku
and
Fire TV
on the first and third Tuesday of each month during Regular Session at 6 p.m. These broadcasts are also available to view on the City's
website
at your convenience. Questions regarding the Internet viewing of these meetings should be directed to the
[Office of the City Secretary](mailto:kmorris@desototexas.gov)
at 972.230.9646.
The building in which the above meeting will be conducted is wheelchair accessible. Access to the building and special parking are available at the primary west entrance facing Hampton Road. Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and may require auxiliary aids or services such as readers or large print, or interpreters for persons who are deaf or hearing impaired, are requested to contact the Office of the City Secretary at 972.230.9646 or by E-mail at
[saubrey@desototexas.gov](mailto:AThomas@desototexas.gov)
or by calling through a T.D.D. (Telecommunication Device for the Deaf) to Relay Texas 1.800.735.2989.
